gui.controller

Class RequestTableScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.RequestTableScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class RequestTableScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for the Request Table screen, responsible for managing and displaying requests.
